name: Renewed Fate
description:
How well do you really know them?

After his best friend, Jude's, death Evan feels lost and scared of falling into old habits. His girlfriend Addison is helping him but the only thing that really helps clear is mind is hiking. This time though the forest has a secret to reveal to him..... Could it be true? Is there a way to bring back his friend? Evan needs to be careful, not everything is at it seems and sometimes you realise you don't know the people closest to you as well you think you do.

Once a decision is made.....there's no turning back.

Features:

- Short story about the complicated nature of relationships

- Important Choices

- Multiple Endings

- Complex characters with positive and negative qualities

(Renewed Fate  is a work of fiction. Names, characters, businesses, places, events, locales, and incidents are either the products of the author's imagination or used in a fictitious manner. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.)
